title: Why can i only post to help and support?
body: in every other section of the boards i get the message "you must be level 6 or higher" even though im level 30 and i can post here, it wont let me comment either :(

replies.body: Sometimes a boards profile needs to sync, especially if it hasn't posted before.  It looks like your post here has updated your profile!  Let me know if you still have any issues posting and I'd happy to help.
